oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gay Street Fire, 1897
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McCrary & Branson, Knoxville, TN
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: View looking north on Gay Street," Million Dollar Fire," 1897. Shows firefighters spraying water into Sanford, Chamberlain, Albers building. Ladder at Cowan and McClung Building. Electrical pole at right foreground.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fires; Firefighting equipment;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
